itemDisplayName: Deploy a REST API hosted either on Azure Function or on Azure Kubernetes using Keda and Prometheus to test the scalability
description: This template and the scripts allows you to deploy a REST API hosted either on Azure Function or on Azure Kubernetes using Keda and Prometheus to test the scalability from the source code on github
summary: This template takes a minimum amount of parameters and deploys a REST API hosted either on Azure Function or on Azure Kubernetes using Keda and Prometheus to test the scalability from the source code on github.
